commit_msg:
Fixing empty array slices (#55)

* empty array slices

* doc comment
annotator_comment: Reporter: "in the slicing method, the line "long rangeCount = 1 + (range.End - range.Start) / range.Step;" is not correct; it mistakenly computes that e.g. the range 1 .. 2 .. 0 has one element, which subsequently causes an ArgumentOutOfRangeException exception."
